content:
There is a contrib module port request of a person new to Backdrop regarding CKEditor: https://github.com/backdrop-ops/contrib/issues/425. Does anyone have experience if such a module can be ported as usual, or are there extra requirements?

Port request for CKEditor Accordion · Issue #425 · backdrop-ops/contrib
Name of the module, theme, or layout CKEditor Accordion Link to the drupal.org module, theme, or layout https://www.drupal.org/project/ckeditor_accordion It looks like a small module but I have not...

Great, @indigoxela has ported CKEditor Accordion. Question is now how to change the issue tag from "Port request" to "Port complete". https://github.com/backdrop-ops/contrib/issues/425#issuecomment-686543248

Port request for CKEditor Accordion · Issue #425 · backdrop-ops/contrib
